Title: An Axe Tempered
Description:
Exemplary. Some of the components can be wrapped and attached by hand, but for the last step, you'll need a powerful forge to unify all three in flame.

I've been speaking to Wrathion. He can direct you to a suitable forge in the Obsidian Citadel. I'll meet you both there! I can't wait to see what happens as a result of my ingenious plan!
ObjectivesText: Head to the Obsidian Citadel and ask the smith to forge the handle onto the axe.

Objectives.Text: Talk to Eadweard at the Obsidian Citadel
